data.description: A normal school toilet... until a whispered choice changes everything. Red or blue? Japanese urban legend Aka Manto traps you in a nightmare of inescapable horror. What would YOU choose if confronted by the terrifying Red Cape demon in a deserted school restroom? This chilling J-horror tale explores the ultimate no-win situation, where both paths lead to unspeakable dread. Experience the psychological terror of Aka Manto, a ghostly figure that preys on the innocent. Dive into the world of creepy Japanese folklore and supernatural encounters. This is not just a story; it's a warning. #JHorror #AkaManto #UrbanLegend #Creepy #Supernatural

data.vrew_script:
The school bell rings a final echo
Corridors empty shadows lengthen
A silent toilet stall waits for you
You enter a strange chill in the air
Then a voice whispers from the dark
Red cape or blue cape which will it be
A choice offered but no escape
Choose red and blood will stain you
Choose blue and life will drain out
Your heart pounds a chilling rhythm
Trapped in a nightmare everyday space
What horror lurks in shadows unseen
The choice is yours but death awaits
A legend born from endless screams
